title: Mobile Instructional Design Workshop for Strengthening 21st-Century Skills in TVET

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Practice-centered curriculum applying experimental teaching methods in smartphone-based microlearning environments

learning_goals: Learners can design three or more digital learning materials for language education using TVET experimental teaching methods.
Learners can develop and implement two collaborative learning scenarios using smartphones.
Learners can create one or more formative assessment tools that reflect 21st-century competencies (4Cs: Critical Thinking, Creativity, Collaboration, Communication).

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
